name: Words Scramble - Cities
description:
Words Scramble- Cities
Do challenging games give you an adrenalin rush? Then this is just the game for you! A superb combination of guessing the city/place name and unscrambling words will keep you hooked for hours together. Look at the beautiful real life pictures from around the world and guess the words that are a part of that picture. So keep playing till you get them all!
Features:
• Beautiful pictures of world cities.
• Colorful images of famous landmarks across cities
• Amazing combination of guess the place and word game
• Option of skipping puzzle.
• Option of revealing or deleting letters.
• Choose soundtrack from 5 soothing musical scores.
• Track high scores across friends, opponents, and the world with enabled leaderboards.
• Share images of solved puzzles with friends on Facebook

As these apps are free, they may contain third party advertisements
